sn22.12:4.4: “Mendicants, form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness are impermanent.
sn22.12:4.5: Seeing this, a learned noble disciple becomes disillusioned with form, feeling, perception, choices, and consciousness.
sn22.12:4.8: When freed, they know ‘it is freed’.
sn22.12:4.9: They understand: ‘Rebirth is ended, the spiritual life has been lived, what had to be done has been done, there is no return to any state of existence.’”
